articles.title: Stuff about the author and the blog
articles.contents:
Hello, welcome to my data science blog! The main focus of this blog is to share some memorable works on such a beautiful field from projects to techniques, and beyond. Although it is mainly statistics, we may explore other topics.
I’m a B.Sc. in Statistics from the Universidade Federal de Pernambuco (UFPE), Brazil. I’m currently passionated about: Deep Learning, NLP, Time-Series and Spatial Statistics. You can contact me at my LinkedIn or send an e-mail at: am.adriel.martins@gmail.com
I’m currently working as Data Scientist at BTG Pactual.
